member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: E:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.NarrativeSaved
member.remarks: The principle idea behind this event is so the client can now update their doc_ref_num

member.name: P:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.DocRefNumber
member.remarks: Used internally within Precedent to identify the instance of the narrative

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.GetRowIDs
member.summary: Get the Row IDs associated with the narrative.
member.remarks: This method is necessary because if we perform an insert we do not know the underlying RowIDs

member.name: P:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.SeparateDatabaseTransaction
member.summary: Does the database work occur in it's own database transaction?
member.remarks: setting this value to TRUE means the narrative will be isolated from the main database transaction

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.Save
member.summary: Saves the narrative to the database.
member.remarks: Use the property SeparateDatabaseTransaction to alter the behaviour of this method.

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.Load(System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads the narrative object with the narrative
member.param: The document reference number of the narrative

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.Load
member.summary: Loads the narrative object with the narrative
member.remarks: Ensure that the document reference number property has been set.

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the narrative text

member.name: T:Miles33.Precedent.NarrativeBL.Narrative
member.summary: This class represents a Precedent narrative.
member.remarks: It manages both the document_profile and document_text portions of the narrative in one convienent object
